archimate:BusinessEvent.name: ADV021 Interpersonal manipulations
archimate:BusinessEvent.documentation:
The threat manipulates individuals within an organisation into performing actions that could harm the organisation (e.g. disclosing sensitive information or granting unauthorised physical access).
Assessment guidance: A threat can use a variety of social engineering techniques, including: ԉ impersonating a valid user, especially one of privilege ԉ persuading an employee or valid user ԉ bribery ԉ extortion or blackmail.
